name: The Core (Geneticon)
description:
Description

2048 on the faces of a three-dimensional cube

Goal of the game

Charge the Central core of the cube by collecting 4 maximum values (4 values of 2048) on the faces of the cube (the victory is conditional).

In order to swipe the blocks the swipes have to be within the main cube.

Swipes outside the cube will rotate the cube
